name: SOLAR UNIVERSAL NETWORK

briefDescription: Our NGO is working for providing solar lighting systems to households and street lights in remote areas and villages using PV modules and LED.We will work in close cooperation with MNRE and other Govt departments.We will appreciate the cooperation of corporate houses and other organizations in fulfilling our mission of solar lights for all.
